actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate held at the desk by unanimous consent.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the House from May 21 to May 27, 1981, and an adjournment of the Senate from May 21 to June 1, 1981.

summary.text: Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from May 21, 1981, until May 27, 1981, and for an adjournment of the Senate from May 21, 1981, until June 1, 1981.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the House from May 21 to May 27, 1981, and an adjournment of the Senate from May 21 to June 1, 1981.
